events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and added it to our tracking system.
The candidate’s profile was reviewed and properly categorized under the Engineering department for software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering positions has been assigned to manage this candidate’s hiring process.
Initial screening call was conducted with the candidate to assess fundamental coding skills and background experience in software engineering.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview stage.
A technical interview session has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team to evaluate coding proficiency and problem-solving skills.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating solid programming abilities and an understanding of software development principles.
Following the successful technical round, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and employment terms.
HR interview was completed with positive feedback on candidate’s alignment with company values and expectations.
A formal job offer was proposed to the candidate for the Software Engineer role, including details of salary and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested minor clarifications regarding the remote work policy.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team at the company.
The onboarding process was initiated, including system access setup and orientation scheduling for the new software engineer.
The hiring process was successfully closed after the candidate completed onboarding and formally joined the engineering team.
